snippet: Two nose-to-tail pork dinners; pairing ice cream with beer (no, really); and a celebration of what would have been Julia Child’s 100th birthday on Aug. 15.
lead_paragraph: Two nose-to-tail pork dinners; pairing ice cream with beer (no, really); and a celebration of what would have been Julia Child’s 100th birthday on Aug. 15.

headline.seo: 100 Candles for Julia Child and Other Food Events - Dining Calendar
